description: A collection of lightweight, high quality Windows shell extensions capable of providing File Explorer thumbnails for essentially any video format.
post_install: Start-Process -Wait -WindowStyle Hidden cmd "/c cd /D `"$($dir)`" && RegSvr32 /s 32-bit\IcarosThumbnailProvider.dll && RegSvr32 /s 32-bit\IcarosPropertyHandler.dll && RegSvr32 /s 64-bit\IcarosThumbnailProvider.dll && RegSvr32 /s 64-bit\IcarosPropertyHandler.dll && reg add HKLM\SOFTWARE\Icaros /f /v `"Thumbnail Extensions`" /t REG_SZ /d `"3g2;3gp;3gp2;3gpp;amv;ape;asf;avi;bik;cb7;cbr;cbz;divx;dpg;dv;dvr-ms;epub;evo;f4v;flac;flv;hdmov;k3g;m1v;m2t;m2ts;m2v;m4b;m4p;m4v;mk3d;mka;mkv;mov;mp2v;mp4;mp4v;mpc;mpe;mpeg;mpg;mpv2;mpv4;mqv;mts;mxf;nsv;ofr;ofs;ogg;ogm;ogv;opus;qt;ram;rm;rmvb;skm;spx;swf;tak;tp;tpr;trp;ts;tta;vob;wav;webm;wm;wmv;wv;xvid`"" -Verb RunAs

script: Start-Process -Wait -WindowStyle Hidden cmd "/c cd /D `"$($dir)`" && RegSvr32 /s /u 32-bit\IcarosThumbnailProvider.dll && RegSvr32 /s /u 32-bit\IcarosPropertyHandler.dll && RegSvr32 /s /u 64-bit\IcarosThumbnailProvider.dll && RegSvr32 /s /u 64-bit\IcarosPropertyHandler.dll && reg delete /f HKLM\SOFTWARE\Icaros" -Verb RunAs
